EmailTemplate.name: LEADS W London BIG Challenge Nov 2011
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to West London's first Challenge Society event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
The Challenge Society is launching its first West London event on 27th November, and you're invited! You'll be working with a local charity for social change and get to be part of a large scale flash mob in Walpole Park to feature in a film about The Challenge Society that is currently in production.
In addition to volunteering, this is a chance to meet up with your Challenge mates and some of the mentors from the summer. As if that isn't incentive enough, everyone who participates will get free hot chocolate and cake at the end of the day!
Think you're up for a real challenge?
Please RSVP by emailing grads@the-challenge.org. Places are limited so sign up now before it's too late! Only those who have RSVP'd will be allowed in.
Where: Ealing Campus Ealing, Hammersmith and Westminster College The Green Ealing W5 5EW
When: 27/11/2011
11:00 - 16:00
Hope you can make it!
Best wishes, The Challenge
